column2: However, the learned Counsel for the Appellant-Respondent took up an objection to the
maintainability of this appeal on  another basis namely  time bar.  The objections of the

column1: learned Counsel for the Respondent  could be set out in this manner. The decision of the

column2: in  this  matter was  read  out in the  well of the  tribunal on
05.04.2019 and a copy of the decision was handed over to the Vice Chancellor and the
Director  General  of  the  University  of  Vocational  Technology  on  08.04.2019.  In  other
